quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.
The one you love and the one who loves you are never ever the same person.
I speak to everyone in the same way whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university..
If you don’t know where you’re going any road’ll take you there
All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never ever be boring.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
All the world is made of faith and trust and pixie dust.
May you live every day of your life.
We have to dare to be ourselves however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
attribution: Anne Frank Anne Frank’s Tales from the Secret Annex

quote: This life’s hard but it’s harder if you’re stupid.
attribution: George V. Higgins The Friends of Eddie Coyle

quote: We’re all human aren’t we? Every human life is worth the same and worth saving.
attribution: J.K. Rowling Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I’m not living.
attribution: Jonathan Safran Foer Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

quote: Death ends a life not a relationship.
Do not read as children do to amuse yourself or like the ambitious for the purpose of instruction. No read in order to live.
Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
23. Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world. Indeed it is the only thing that ever has.
Where there is love there is life.
Some people have lives; some people have music.
attribution: John Green Will Grayson Will Grayson

quote: I go to seek a Great Perhaps.
That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet.
You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past.
Life is to be enjoyed not endured
People aren’t born good or bad. Maybe they’re born with tendencies either way but its the way you live your life that matters.
Unbeing dead isn’t being alive.
The more I see the less I know for sure.
Life is for the living. Death is for the dead. Let life be like music. And death a note unsaid.
If you love somebody let them go for if they return they were always yours. If they don’t they never were.
The things you do for yourself are gone when you are gone but the things you do for others remain as your legacy.
The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
Biology gives you a brain. Life turns it into a mind.
Maybe everyone can live beyond what they’re capable of.
attribution: Markus Zusak I Am the Messenger

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards but of playing a poor hand well.
A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
I find out a lot about myself by sleeping. Dreams they are who I am when I’m too tired to be me.
Was it hard? I ask. Letting go? Not as hard as holding on to something that wasn’t real.
To say goodbye is to die a little.
The past has no power over the present moment.
I’m sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It’s just been too intelligent to come here.
One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries.
No matter how much suffering you went through you never wanted to let go of those memories.
I like flaws. I think they make things interesting.
attribution: Sarah Dessen The Truth About Forever

quote: The more you know who you are and what you want the less you let things upset you.
attribution: Stephanie Perkins Anna and the French Kiss
